titleInfo.title: Nashville Songwriters Association International's Legislative Show (Apr. 2010)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. The image may not be downloaded, reproduced, or distributed without permission. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color lobby card (blue and green on white) announcing Nashville Songwriters Association International's Legislative Show with Jim Collins, Jim Weatherly, Jamie Kyle, and Allen Shamblin at the Bluebird Cafe on April 20. All proceeds go towards NSAI's Legislative efforts which support the rights of songwriters everywhere. Poster features woodcuts of stars.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
